body.p: THE WORLD BANK GROUP
STAFF RETIREMENT PLAN
ELECTION OF CURRENCY FOR PENSION

value.text: (for participants joining on or before April 14, 1998)

body.p: Please refer to the Staff Retirement Plan
(Plan) document or consult Pension
Administration if you have questions.
You should NOT complete this form if you wish to receive 100% of your pension in US dollars
Please refer to the "Currency Option Fact Sheet" and/or "Euro Currency Fact Sheet" BEFORE completing this form.
ENTER UPI HERE, THEN USE TAB TO MOVE BETWEEN FIELDS:

Name
(Last, First, M.I.)

Address of Principal Residence
(attach appropriate evidence of residence in country -- see the continuation of this page)
Percentage of Pension to be Received in Currency Other Than US Dollars
(if less than 100%, balance will be paid in US dollars)

value.text: 2. INSTRUCTION FOR PAYMENT OF MONTHLY PENSION

body.p: A. For US Dollar Currency

ABA No./SWIFT BIC
(provided by your bank)

Other
(indicate)
Bank Address

Electronic Funds Transfer
(please read note below)

NOTE
I am aware that payments will be processed electronically to my
banking institution as designated above.
In the event that funds to which I am not entitled may be deposited
into my account, I authorize the Staff Retirement Plan to initiate, if necessary,
debit entries to my account to recover those funds. This authority is to remain in
full force and effect until I notify the Staff Retirement Plan in writing of its
termination in such time and in such manner as to afford the Staff Retirement
Plan a reasonable opportunity to cancel my previous authorization.

B.
For Non-US Dollar Currency

Bank's SWIFT BIC
(provided by your bank)
Attach a void check or a deposit slip to this form. The check/deposit slip must be from the account to be credited for your pension payment.
If bank entered in 2.A. above is not located in the U.S., enter intermediary bank
(contact your bank for this information)
I made this election fully aware that the US dollar equivalent of the elected currency could be less than the pension that
would have been payable to me in US dollars, if I had not made this election.
For Pension Administration Use Only

value.text: Completed forms: Mail MSN C 7-702 Drop-off MC 1-850

body.p: Please ensure ALL information in the submission form is complete and accurate before printing the form.

Click here to
Print Form
To view the form, please enable JavaScript in your PDF reader and click anywhere on the yellow area.
If after clicking on the yellow area, you cannot view the form, it means that JavaScript has not been enabled in your PDF reader.
Please enable the JavaScript in your PDF reader before proceeding further.

This form requires Adobe Ò Acrobat Ò reader version 9.0 or later.
Note: For all questions about this form, please contact the Pension Administration (x82977).
